identity.philosophy: Precision tools for the wild. We blend the romance of travel with the precision of AI.
core_principles: Fusion: National Geographic photography x Bloomberg Terminal data density.
Emotion: Every interaction should feel like the anticipation of a trip.
Depth: Use z-index and glassmorphism to create a sense of atmosphere (fog, air, distance).
Anti-Slop: No generic 'hero image right, text left'. No default Bootstrap grids.

primary_heading.usage: Hero titles, emotional statements, destination names.

secondary_heading.usage: Section headers, card titles, UI elements.

data_technical.usage: Flight numbers, prices, dates, coordinates, technical specs.

rules: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all data points (prices, dates) to give a 'cockpit' feel.
Overlines (e.g., 'DESTINATION') must be wide (tracking-widest) and tiny.

secondary.name: Clay
secondary.usage: Warm accents, 'Book Now' buttons, urgent notifications.

accent.name: Electric Moss
accent.usage: Success states, AI indicators, active toggles.

rules: Use 'Electric Moss' sparinglyâ€”only for AI moments or success.
Text on dark backgrounds must be Slate-200, not pure white (reduces eye strain).

containers.glass_card: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/5 border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-2xl
containers.floating_nav: fixed top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 w-[90%] max-w-5xl backdrop-blur-md bg-black/80 border border-white/10 rounded-full z-50

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-4 bg-primary text-white font-medium hover:scale-105 transition-transform shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-8 py-4 border border-border bg-transparent hover:bg-secondary/10 transition-colors
buttons.ghost: text-sm font-mono uppercase tracking-widest hover:text-primary transition-colors

cards.destination: aspect-[3/4] relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl group cursor-pointer
cards.itinerary_item: flex gap-4 p-4 border-l-2 border-border hover:border-primary transition-colors bg-card/30

inputs.style: h-14 bg-secondary/5 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-xl text-lg px-4 transition-all

textures.noise: Add a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire app background to kill digital flatness.
textures.gradients: Use soft, large radial gradients behind hero sections.

images.style: Cinematic, high contrast, natural lighting. No stock-photo smiles.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets APCA standards. Use text-shadow on image overlays.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Refactor 'App.js' to use the new layout wrapper.
2. Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the new color palette (Deep Ocean, Clay, Electric Moss).
3. Create a 'Layout.js' component that implements the floating navigation and noise texture.
4. Redesign the 'LandingPage.js' using the 'Tetris Grid' and new typography.
5. Update 'TripPlannerPage.js' to use the 'Bento Grid' for the form elements.
6. Ensure all buttons use the 'rounded-full' style.
7. Replace generic 'Inter' font usage with 'Manrope' and 'Playfair Display'.
8. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all pricing and date displays.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very specific 'AI Magic' moment.
Avoid 'card' backgrounds on white pages. Use whitespace and borders instead.
Always add a subtle 'active' state to navigation items.
Keep the 'AIChatBubble' but make it glassmorphic.
